{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.05734v1", "title": "An Asymptotic formula for Tate-Shafarevich groups of CM elliptic curves
  at supersingular primes", "summary": "Let $K$ be an imaginary quadratic field and $E/\mathbb{Q}$ an elliptic curves
with complex multiplication by $\mathcal{O}_K$. Let $K_\infty/K$ be the
anticyclotomic $\mathbb{Z}_p$-extension of $K$ and $K_n$ the intermediate
layers. Under additional assumptions on Kobayashi's signed Selmer groups we
prove an asymptotic formula for the Tate-Shafarevich group over $K_n$.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-04-08T07:07:50Z"}
